title: Tamara Ecclestone launches rant about 'breastfeeding'
text: show ad 'It's sad it evokes hatred in so many bitter people': Tamara Ecclestone launches an impassioned rant about 'sexualising breastfeeding' as she continues to nurse Sophia at almost 3 The heiress, 32, explained the reasoning behind her decision to continue breastfeeding daughter Sophia, who turns three next month Socialite said she wanted to speak out on the issue to stem the tide of 'hatred' she was experiencing on social media Tamara and Sophia posed in an an elegant shoot for photographer Ivette Ivens Mother-of-one is the daughter of billionaire Formula One tycoon Bernie Ecclestone, 86 She shares Sophia with former City trader husband Jay Rutland, 35 Couple tied the knot in an extravagant French Riviera wedding, believing to have cost Â£12million, in June 2013 Tamara has previously hinted she may continue to nurse her only daughter until the age of four Long-term breastfeeding has provoked quite the debate between Tamara's social media followers Published: 13:12 GMT, 9 February 2017 | Updated: 14:44 GMT, 9 February 2017 334 shares
